column5: Hey guys,  I'm looking to buy a custom boat cover and wanted to ask if you guys know a place around the GTA that sells boat covers at a reasonable price.  Thank you for your time and any help is greatly appreciated!  Regards,  Rick
Not sure myself in the GTA for a shop,but get a custom made snap on cover,a little pricey but well worth it.
I know a guy in Dunnville thats reasonable, if your interested. Might be a little to far for you.
i just got a beautiful custom cover done in thornhill, very reasonable price as well. shoot me over a pm if your interested. i couldnt recommend them any more

Covers Unlimited 905-451-3346  99 West Drive, Unit B Brampton, ON. L6T 2J6  www.coversunlimited.ca  I would highly recommend Greg. He will custom make any type of cover you like, and is very reasonable. You drop the boat off in the morning, and it is ready at days end!
You can check this site under the Forms heading and get an idea of pricing for your boat.  http://www.dufort.mb.ca/index.html
get some quotes cause when i needed one the prices varied greatly from company to company. also many different types of materials to choose from. some more expensive than others.

Depending exactly how you are going to use your cover should dictate how much you should spend on material....I have a 25 year old canvas cover on my boat,however I don't use it that much...only now and then...if I was going to constantly use it when the boat was not in use (mine's in the garage when not in use) I would purchase the BEST material money can buy because the labor is about the same.  Hope this helps, Bob
Use Eagle Marine in Burlington,, on industrial rd.. Best work ever ,might be a little more but worth it in the long run,,,
I got mine done by Custom Covers by Robert in Brampton.
